name: Disable Microsoft Office Security Features
description: Disable Microsoft Office Security Features by registry
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\.*/ AND registry.path:(/.*[Vv][Bb][Aa][Ww][Aa][Rr][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss]/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Uu][Nn][Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office\\* AND registry.path:(*VBAWarnings OR *DisableInternetFilesInPV OR *DisableUnsafeLocationsInPV OR *DisableAttachementsInPV) AND winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD\ \(0x00000001\))`
